comic-needleful.title: Apple
comic-needleful.description: girls hatch from apples and boys hatch from bell peppers and that's why girls are crisp and boys are spicy

transcript.p: Lee is staring intently at an apple. It's been set on a pillow with a lamp shining on it. He scratches his nose. Suddenly, the apple begins to crack. It splits open like an apple, revealing a tiny pink lady.
Lee: Will you be my girlfriend?
Pink Lady: Creating a sentient lifeform just to trick it into being your girlfriend is exactly why you don't have a girlfriend.
Pink lady: lmao I most definitely will.
